duties_responsibilities.duty: Assess performance using evaluation criteria and technical performance measures
Identify and then elevate, if necessary, issues in processing and products
Ensure systems and products are vetted using test plans and methodologies
Be proactive in making recommendations for efficiency improvements in processing and PQ
Assist in the development of processes and procedures for operational processing
Be flexible and assist in other duties as needed by the customer
Demonstrated ability to clearly communicate technical information to both technical and non-technical audiences
Strong multi-tasking skills and ability to meet time critical needs/demands with close attention to detail

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree and 2+ years of related professional experience
